4305050.name: Operation Obliteration 2 Demo
4305050.description:
No locks. No limits. No mercy.

Operation Obliteration 2 is old-school FPS warfare stripped to the bone.
No cutscenes. No filler. No hand-holding... No safe spaces. Just weapons, enemies, and handcrafted levels
built to hit fast and hit hard. Adapt, improvise or die. learn or die again.

Fight through a brutal alternate-history WWII campaign where aggression is survival and hesitation is death.
Play the campaign straight through—or drop into any mission instantly. Nothing hidden, every level available.

FEATURES
• 20 handcrafted combat levels across diverse battlefields
• Every level unlocked from launch
• Fast, ruthless, skill-driven gunplay
• Custom photo-realistic military HUD
• Manual saves and checkpoints
• Free playable demo and trailer

Buy Operation Obliteration 2 and get the original Operation Obliteration free. One purchase. Two games.

Command Centre: oblitgamewerks.github.io/OB/

Play the Demo and get in the war!
4305050.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
